tools.name: open_document
tools.title: Open Document
tools.description: Opens a Word document and prepares it for editing. This must be the first tool called.

file_path.description: The absolute path to the .docx file.

tools.name: shutdown_word
tools.title: Shutdown Word
tools.description: Closes the document and shuts down the Word application instance. Should be called at the end of a session.

tools.name: insert_paragraph
tools.title: Insert Paragraph
tools.description: Inserts a new paragraph with the given text relative to the element found by the locator.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the anchor element.

text.description: The text of the paragraph to insert.

tools.name: get_text_from_cell
tools.title: Get Text From Cell
tools.description: Retrieves the text from a single table cell found by the locator.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the target cell.

tools.name: delete_element
tools.title: Delete Element
tools.description: Deletes the element(s) found by the locator.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the target element(s) to delete.

tools.name: get_text
tools.title: Get Text
tools.description: Retrieves the text from all elements found by the locator.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the target element(s).

tools.name: replace_text
tools.title: Replace Text
tools.description: Replaces the text content of the element(s) found by the locator with new text.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the target element(s) to replace.

new_text.description: The new text to replace the existing content.

tools.name: set_cell_value
tools.title: Set Cell Value
tools.description: Sets the text value of a single table cell found by the locator.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the target cell.

text.description: The text to set in the cell.

tools.name: create_table
tools.title: Create Table
tools.description: Creates a new table at the location specified by the locator.

locator.description: The Locator object to find the anchor point for the new table.

rows.description: Number of rows for the new table.

cols.description: Number of columns for the new table.
